pages.text: Communication over MIDI happens via discrete messages that generally include a single command or status.$(br2)While most messages are intended to apply to only a single channel some will apply to all of them.

pages.title: Note On
pages.text: These messages apply to a single channel and turn the specified note on.$(br2)A Note On message includes the note to turn on and the velocity to use (how hard the note was played).$(br2)When a synthesizer receives a Note On message it will generally keep that note turned on until it receives a corresponding Note off message.

pages.title: Note Off
pages.text: These messages apply to a single channel and turn the specified note off.

pages.title: Program Change
pages.text: These messages apply to a single channel and inform the synthesizer that any following note data should be played using the specified program.$(br2)Not all synthesizers, such as the instruments in this mod, will handle program change messages since they may only support a single program.

pages.title: All Sounds Off
pages.text: These messages apply to all channels and instruct the synthesizer to immediately stop all sounds it is producing.$(br2)A similar message, All Notes Off, applies to only a single channel.
